alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 9:44PM CDT until April 04 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lamar County in north central Texas... East central Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 943 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Honey Grove, or 14 miles west of Paris, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Honey Grove, Blossom, Roxton, Toco and Sun Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
